Trade/Device Name(s): Alinity i STAT High Sensitivity Troponin-I
Regulation Name(s): Creatine Phosphokinase/Creatine Kinase Or Isoenzymes Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alinity i STAT High Sensitivity Troponin-I CMIA assay for quantitative determination of cardiac troponin I in plasma using the Alinity i system
Indications for Use Summary: Aid in the diagnosis of myocardial infarction by quantitatively determining cardiac troponin I (cTnI) in human plasma (lithium heparin) on the Alinity i system
